body:
First things first. I'm not super new to the server so this is not I just joins the forums or server discussion. 

Anyways I feel like not a lot of people have really gotten to know me so ask me stuff and I'll answer [obviously :P].

title: My first AMA

replies.body:
Do you want to be my friend?
What you would do as my friend?
replies.body_tagged:

What you would do as my friend?

replies.body:
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
What have you thought of Avicus so far?
Potato?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
@ivifetita: sure I guess if we get along. Joke around, talk, play some MC w/ you I guess :P. All depends on the person really. 

@davidan: Rock and Dubstep, Glitch Hop, Electro, etc. I just enjoy music, I'm not a genre-specific listener but those I mainly listen to. 

@Cezbla: probably not, I'm not a violent person really, I will hold off until you go for me first, I'll fight in self defense, not really because I'm mad. I keep pretty calm so no I guess :P. Wouldn't hesitate to punch them with my 1.7.10 appearing as Steve skin on the server. Lol
